QuestData.Title: Taelan Fordring's Legacy
QuestData.Description: Greetings. How do you do? My name is Daria.$b$bI am one of the priests in charge of preserving the peace here in Hearthglen. One of my duties involves maintaining the tower down the trail to the southeast of Hearthglen. This particular tower is of personal importance to the Highlord. It's the place where his son was killed.$b$bWith the recent incursion of gnolls, however, maintenance of the tower has grown difficult. Will you help me rid the trail of some of these gnoll vandals, so I can do my duty?
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Sorry, I hope you don't mind if I use Mind Vision on you.
QuestData.RewardText: I must admit, $n... I have been using my mind vision spell to keep tabs on you. And I must say... the number of gnolls you found on the trail is truly staggering!
